alert.note: Alert for Campbell (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:50PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Corson and Campbell Counties through 215 PM CDT/115 PM MDT/... At 150 PM CDT/1250 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Ashley to near Little Eagle. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wakpala. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
